appDescription.message: Jaza fomu yoyote ya wavuti kwa kutumia sauti yako tu!

popup_allow_permission_btn_str.description: String on the button on popup page that allows user to navigate to permissions page

popup_allow_permission_btn_tooltip_str.message: bonyeza hapa Ruhusu Ruhusa ya Sauti

popup_help_desc_str.message: Ikiwa umepata shida yoyote, tafadhali ripoti

popup_default_language_label_str.description: label for default language on popup

popup_mic_btn_tooltip_str.message: Bonyeza hapa kuwasha / Kuzima Utambuzi wa Hotuba
popup_mic_btn_tooltip_str.description: mic button tooltip on popup page

option_onstart_setting_str.message: Anza 'Utambuzi wa Hotuba' wakati Chrome inapoanza

option_default_lang_change_setting_str.message: Badilisha Lugha ya Utambuzi wa Hotuba

option_permission_success_msg.message: Sasa unaweza kufunga kichupo hiki na utumie zana hii kuandika kwenye wavuti yoyote kwa sauti yako!
option_permission_success_msg.description: success message when user accepts permission

option_permission_error_msg.message: Tafadhali Ruhusu Ruhusa ili utumie zana hii!
option_permission_error_msg.description: error message when user rejects permission
